pronunciation.pinyin: zěn yī gè chóu zì liǎo dé
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: zen3 yi1 ge4 chou2 zi4 liao3 de2

meanings.value: (last line of the poem 聲聲慢|声声慢[Sheng1 sheng1 Man4] by Song poet Li Qingzhao 李清照[Li3 Qing1 zhao4])
how can it be expressed in one word, "sorrow"?
how can words express such sadness?
